Posts.Content: I'm sure your holiday will be almost as enjoyable as the conference. Please could you pass on the link to anyone who you think might benefit from it. That could be people in your local support groups but it could be local health professionals who deal with cancer.
Posts.Title: North West Regional Survivorship Conference

Posts.Content: Some of you might be interested in this event. It is a rare opportunity to explore and discuss available support after cancer treatment. there are some great speakers and a nice lunch. www.paddlersforlife.co.uk/.../PfLUK.htm
Posts.Title: North West Regional Survivorship Conference
